title: Fragment, 14th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic (beaten gold on vellum wrapped around white silk core)
Technique: 2 integrated structures (lampas)
description: Arranged in horizontal rows, a lion with a peacock tail attacking a gazelle, and a phoenix attacking a smaller bird, in gold metallic thread. The ground is a fine herringbone twill with small ivy vines, in gold on green with blue blossoms.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 14th century.
14th century. Medium: silk, metallic (beaten gold on vellum wrapped around white silk core)
Technique: 2 integrated structures (lampas). Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-275.
